00023 typedef struct _nmeaParserNODE
00024 {
00025     int packType;
00026     void *pack;
00027     struct _nmeaParserNODE *next_node;
00028 
00029 } nmeaParserNODE;

00032  * high level

00039 int nmea_parser_init(nmeaPARSER *parser)
00040 {
00041     int resv = 0;
00042     int buff_size = nmea_property()->parse_buff_size;
00043 
00044     NMEA_ASSERT(parser);
00045 
00046     if(buff_size < NMEA_MIN_PARSEBUFF)
00047         buff_size = NMEA_MIN_PARSEBUFF;
00048 
00049     memset(parser, 0, sizeof(nmeaPARSER));
00050 
00051     if(0 == (parser->buffer = malloc(buff_size)))
00052         nmea_error("Insufficient memory!");
00053     else
00054     {
00055         parser->buff_size = buff_size;
00056         resv = 1;
00057     }    
00058 
00059     return resv;
00060 }
00061 
00065 void nmea_parser_destroy(nmeaPARSER *parser)
00066 {
00067     NMEA_ASSERT(parser && parser->buffer);
00068     free(parser->buffer);
00069     nmea_parser_queue_clear(parser);
00070     memset(parser, 0, sizeof(nmeaPARSER));
00071 }
00072 
00077 int nmea_parse(    
00078     nmeaPARSER *parser,
00079     const char *buff, int buff_sz,
00080     nmeaINFO *info
00081     )
00082 {
00083     int ptype, nread = 0;
00084     void *pack = 0;
00085 
00086     NMEA_ASSERT(parser && parser->buffer);
00087 
00088     nmea_parser_push(parser, buff, buff_sz);
00089 
00090     while(GPNON != (ptype = nmea_parser_pop(parser, &pack)))
00091     {
00092         nread++;
00093 
00094         switch(ptype)
00095         {
00096         case GPGGA:
00097             nmea_GPGGA2info((nmeaGPGGA *)pack, info);
00098             break;
00099         case GPGSA:
00100             nmea_GPGSA2info((nmeaGPGSA *)pack, info);
00101             break;
00102         case GPGSV:
00103             nmea_GPGSV2info((nmeaGPGSV *)pack, info);
00104             break;
00105         case GPRMC:
00106             nmea_GPRMC2info((nmeaGPRMC *)pack, info);
00107             break;
00108         case GPVTG:
00109             nmea_GPVTG2info((nmeaGPVTG *)pack, info);
00110             break;
00111         };
00112 
00113         free(pack);
00114     }
00115 
00116     return nread;
00117 }
00118 
00119 /*
00120  * low level
00121  */
00122 
00123 int nmea_parser_real_push(nmeaPARSER *parser, const char *buff, int buff_sz)
00124 {
00125     int nparsed = 0, crc, sen_sz, ptype;
00126     nmeaParserNODE *node = 0;
00127 
00128     NMEA_ASSERT(parser && parser->buffer);
00129 
00130     /* clear unuse buffer (for debug) */
00131     /*
00132     memset(
00133         parser->buffer + parser->buff_use, 0,
00134         parser->buff_size - parser->buff_use
00135         );
00136         */
00137 
00138     /* add */
00139     if(parser->buff_use + buff_sz >= parser->buff_size)
00140         nmea_parser_buff_clear(parser);
00141 
00142     memcpy(parser->buffer + parser->buff_use, buff, buff_sz);
00143     parser->buff_use += buff_sz;
00144 
00145     /* parse */
00146     for(;;node = 0)
00147     {
00148         sen_sz = nmea_find_tail(
00149             (const char *)parser->buffer + nparsed,
00150             (int)parser->buff_use - nparsed, &crc);
00151 
00152         if(!sen_sz)
00153         {
00154             if(nparsed)
00155                 memcpy(
00156                 parser->buffer,
00157                 parser->buffer + nparsed,
00158                 parser->buff_use -= nparsed);
00159             break;
00160         }
00161         else if(crc >= 0)
00162         {
00163             ptype = nmea_pack_type(
00164                 (const char *)parser->buffer + nparsed + 1,
00165                 parser->buff_use - nparsed - 1);
00166 
00167             if(0 == (node = malloc(sizeof(nmeaParserNODE))))
00168                 goto mem_fail;
00169 
00170             node->pack = 0;
00171 
00172             switch(ptype)
00173             {
00174             case GPGGA:
00175                 if(0 == (node->pack = malloc(sizeof(nmeaGPGGA))))
00176                     goto mem_fail;
00177                 node->packType = GPGGA;
00178                 if(!nmea_parse_GPGGA(
00179                     (const char *)parser->buffer + nparsed,
00180                     sen_sz, (nmeaGPGGA *)node->pack))
00181                 {
00182                     free(node);
00183                     node = 0;
00184                 }
00185                 break;
00186             case GPGSA:
00187                 if(0 == (node->pack = malloc(sizeof(nmeaGPGSA))))
00188                     goto mem_fail;
00189                 node->packType = GPGSA;
00190                 if(!nmea_parse_GPGSA(
00191                     (const char *)parser->buffer + nparsed,
00192                     sen_sz, (nmeaGPGSA *)node->pack))
00193                 {
00194                     free(node);
00195                     node = 0;
00196                 }
00197                 break;
00198             case GPGSV:
00199                 if(0 == (node->pack = malloc(sizeof(nmeaGPGSV))))
00200                     goto mem_fail;
00201                 node->packType = GPGSV;
00202                 if(!nmea_parse_GPGSV(
00203                     (const char *)parser->buffer + nparsed,
00204                     sen_sz, (nmeaGPGSV *)node->pack))
00205                 {
00206                     free(node);
00207                     node = 0;
00208                 }
00209                 break;
00210             case GPRMC:
00211                 if(0 == (node->pack = malloc(sizeof(nmeaGPRMC))))
00212                     goto mem_fail;
00213                 node->packType = GPRMC;
00214                 if(!nmea_parse_GPRMC(
00215                     (const char *)parser->buffer + nparsed,
00216                     sen_sz, (nmeaGPRMC *)node->pack))
00217                 {
00218                     free(node);
00219                     node = 0;
00220                 }
00221                 break;
00222             case GPVTG:
00223                 if(0 == (node->pack = malloc(sizeof(nmeaGPVTG))))
00224                     goto mem_fail;
00225                 node->packType = GPVTG;
00226                 if(!nmea_parse_GPVTG(
00227                     (const char *)parser->buffer + nparsed,
00228                     sen_sz, (nmeaGPVTG *)node->pack))
00229                 {
00230                     free(node);
00231                     node = 0;
00232                 }
00233                 break;
00234             default:
00235                 free(node);
00236                 node = 0;
00237                 break;
00238             };
00239 
00240             if(node)
00241             {
00242                 if(parser->end_node)
00243                     ((nmeaParserNODE *)parser->end_node)->next_node = node;
00244                 parser->end_node = node;
00245                 if(!parser->top_node)
00246                     parser->top_node = node;
00247                 node->next_node = 0;
00248             }
00249         }
00250 
00251         nparsed += sen_sz;
00252     }
00253 
00254     return nparsed;
00255 
00256 mem_fail:
00257     if(node)
00258         free(node);
00259 
00260     nmea_error("Insufficient memory!");
00261 
00262     return -1;
00263 }
00264 
00269 int nmea_parser_push(nmeaPARSER *parser, const char *buff, int buff_sz)
00270 {
00271     int nparse, nparsed = 0;
00272 
00273     do
00274     {
00275         if(buff_sz > parser->buff_size)
00276             nparse = parser->buff_size;
00277         else
00278             nparse = buff_sz;
00279 
00280         nparsed += nmea_parser_real_push(
00281             parser, buff, nparse);
00282 
00283         buff_sz -= nparse;
00284 
00285     } while(buff_sz);
00286 
00287     return nparsed;
00288 }
00289 
00295 int nmea_parser_top(nmeaPARSER *parser)
00296 {
00297     int retval = GPNON;
00298     nmeaParserNODE *node = (nmeaParserNODE *)parser->top_node;
00299 
00300     NMEA_ASSERT(parser && parser->buffer);
00301 
00302     if(node)
00303         retval = node->packType;
00304 
00305     return retval;
00306 }
00307 
00313 int nmea_parser_pop(nmeaPARSER *parser, void **pack_ptr)
00314 {
00315     int retval = GPNON;
00316     nmeaParserNODE *node = (nmeaParserNODE *)parser->top_node;
00317 
00318     NMEA_ASSERT(parser && parser->buffer);
00319 
00320     if(node)
00321     {
00322         *pack_ptr = node->pack;
00323         retval = node->packType;
00324         parser->top_node = node->next_node;
00325         if(!parser->top_node)
00326             parser->end_node = 0;
00327         free(node);
00328     }
00329 
00330     return retval;
00331 }
00332 
00338 int nmea_parser_peek(nmeaPARSER *parser, void **pack_ptr)
00339 {
00340     int retval = GPNON;
00341     nmeaParserNODE *node = (nmeaParserNODE *)parser->top_node;
00342 
00343     NMEA_ASSERT(parser && parser->buffer);
00344 
00345     if(node)
00346     {
00347         *pack_ptr = node->pack;
00348         retval = node->packType;
00349     }
00350 
00351     return retval;
00352 }
00353 
00359 int nmea_parser_drop(nmeaPARSER *parser)
00360 {
00361     int retval = GPNON;
00362     nmeaParserNODE *node = (nmeaParserNODE *)parser->top_node;
00363 
00364     NMEA_ASSERT(parser && parser->buffer);
00365 
00366     if(node)
00367     {
00368         if(node->pack)
00369             free(node->pack);
00370         retval = node->packType;
00371         parser->top_node = node->next_node;
00372         if(!parser->top_node)
00373             parser->end_node = 0;
00374         free(node);
00375     }
00376 
00377     return retval;
00378 }
00379 
00384 int nmea_parser_buff_clear(nmeaPARSER *parser)
00385 {
00386     NMEA_ASSERT(parser && parser->buffer);
00387     parser->buff_use = 0;
00388     return 1;
00389 }
00390 
00395 int nmea_parser_queue_clear(nmeaPARSER *parser)
00396 {
00397     NMEA_ASSERT(parser);
00398     while(parser->top_node)
00399         nmea_parser_drop(parser);
00400     return 1;
00401 }
